backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing user onboarding, authorization, invite codes, vehicle records, status reporting, notifications, and blob storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting an onboarding error‑handling update and its related components, files, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of summarized frontend files describing hooks, pages, components, routing, PWA setup, and actor integration behavior.
frontend/.eslintrc.cjs: ESLint configuration for TypeScript and React with custom rules and ignored patterns.
frontend/.prettierrc.json: Prettier configuration specifying formatting rules such as semicolons, print width, and quote style.
frontend/CHANGE_CONTROL_POLICY.md: Defines protected interfaces, backend API stability rules, and mandatory review checklist for safe code changes.
frontend/CHANGELOG.md: Project changelog detailing added features, quality gates, versioning system, and release notes for versions 1.0.0 and 0.1.0.
frontend/ci-run-gates.sh: Shell script running frontend quality gates in CI by invoking npm run gates.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining design tokens, light/dark theme variables, and base styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, PWA manifest, icons, and loading the main React application.
frontend/PR_CHECKLIST.md: Pull request checklist enforcing change‑control, quality gates, documentation updates, and manual testing.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: Defines PWA metadata including icons, colors, categories, and default language.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker handling caching rules with network-first and cache-first strategies and icon exclusions.
frontend/QUALITY_GATES.md: Documentation explaining automated quality gates and how to run them.
frontend/README_CHANGE_CONTROL.md: Guide explaining how to use the change‑control system during feature development.
frontend/README_VERSIONING.md: Documentation on semantic versioning practices and version‑update procedure.
frontend/src/__tests__/router-smoke.test: Empty test file placeholder for router smoke tests.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the React app theme and full TanStack Router route tree for all pages.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: UI for access denial with optional first-admin claim form and navigation logic.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileBoot: Displays profile loading errors with backend health info and error copy functionality.
frontend/src/components/auth/SignInScree: Internet Identity sign-in screen with app branding and feature highlights.
frontend/src/components/auth/StartupBoot: Shows startup initialization errors with retry logic, health diagnostics, and error copying.
frontend/src/components/brand/AppLogo.ts: Renders the application logo in configurable sizes.
frontend/src/components/i18n/LanguageSwi: Empty file for future language switcher component.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Layout wrapper that shows header and footer based on authentication and routing, rendering children within the main area.
frontend/src/components/lost/MarkLostDia: Dialog for reporting a vehicle as lost, stolen, or pawned with category selection and note submission.
frontend/src/components/lost/ReportFound: Dialog for submitting a found report for a previously lost vehicle, including a required description field.
frontend/src/components/nav/AppHeader.ts: Top navigation bar with user menu, navigation links, and conditional admin link based on backend checks.
frontend/src/components/system/TopLevelE: Error boundary that catches top-level render failures and displays a fallback UI.
Fallback UI shown when an unrecoverable app error occurs, offering reload guidance.
frontend/src/components/transfer/Initiat: Panel to initiate a vehicle transfer by verifying PIN and generating a shareable transfer code.
frontend/src/components/transfer/PinProm: Dialog prompting the user for a PIN with validation and submission handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorBootstrapStat: Tracks actor bootstrap state with retry logic including exponential and continuous retries for stopped canisters.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Provides admin checks, first-admin onboarding, and admin-restricted queries and mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendHealth.ts: Checks backend reachability via anonymous actor and returns basic diagnostics.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth state, login, logout, and client initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useLostVehicles.ts: Fetches lost vehicles and provides mutations to mark vehicles lost or found.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Fetches user notifications and marks them as read with auto‑refresh.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnboarding.ts: Handles user onboarding with invite validation and error normalization.
frontend/src/hooks/usePin.ts: Provides PIN setup and update mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfile.ts: Loads and updates the caller's user profile with identity‑scoped queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useTransfers.ts: Handles vehicle transfer initiation and acceptance with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useVehicleCheck.ts: Checks vehicle status by engine number using a backend call.
frontend/src/hooks/useVehicles.ts: Fetches and registers vehicles, including per‑vehicle queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/__tests__/VehiclesPag: Test file placeholder with no content.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Displays app information, features, and admin contact details with branding.
frontend/src/pages/AcceptTransferPage.ts: Form page for entering and submitting a vehicle transfer code with validation and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Renders admin-only dashboard with system statistics and handles access verification and errors.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminInviteToke: Manages admin invite tokens, enabling creation, display, and copying of unused and used tokens.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Shows user stats, quick actions, and navigation links using vehicle, report, and notification data.
frontend/src/pages/LostVehiclesPage.tsx: Lists reported lost, stolen, or pawned vehicles with search and status badges.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Displays user notifications and allows marking them as read.
Handles user onboarding with invite tokens or first-admin claiming, collecting profile info and submitting it to complete registration.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Displays and edits the logged-in user's profile, allowing updates and logout via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/pages/RegisterVehiclePage.t: Provides a form to register a vehicle, upload a photo with progress tracking, and submit details to the backend.
Allows users to create or update a PIN used for secure vehicle ownership transfers.
frontend/src/pages/VehicleCheckPage.tsx: Lets users check a vehicle's status by engine number and displays details, photo, and status badge.
frontend/src/pages/VehicleDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed vehicle info, status badges, and actions like transfers or lost reports for the selected vehicle.
frontend/src/pages/VehiclesPage.tsx: Shows the user's vehicles with status indicators and provides navigation to register or view individual vehicles.
frontend/src/routes/__tests__/RootRouteG: Test file placeholder with no content.
frontend/src/routes/RootRouteGate.tsx: Controls authentication, onboarding redirects, and actor bootstrap error handling before rendering the app layout.
frontend/src/test/setup.ts: Test setup file placeholder with no content.
frontend/src/utils/__tests__/bootstrapEr: Test file placeholder with no content.
frontend/src/utils/actorProxy.ts: Wraps backend actor to safely handle access control initialization and avoid startup failures from bad admin tokens.
frontend/src/utils/actorQueryKey.ts: Generates a stable React Query key for actor-related queries.
frontend/src/utils/adminAllowlist.ts: Provides a client-side allowlist check for admin principals and utilities to retrieve the list.
frontend/src/utils/bootstrapError.ts: Provides utilities to detect canister-stopped errors, extract technical error details, and classify bootstrap errors with guidance messages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using both query strings and hash-based routing.
frontend/src/version.ts: Defines the application's version number and build date.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, typography, container settings, and custom animations.
frontend/vitest.config.ts: Placeholder Vitest configuration file with no content.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current state, issues, and feature requests related to fixing user onboarding and authorization flows.
